 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצַח‎</span> **verb** ==murder, slay== (Late Hebrew (rare, also in derivatives) = Biblical Hebrew; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break, bruise, crush***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> [[Num.35.27|Num 35:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְצָחוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.22.26|Deut 22:26]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הֲ)רָצַחְתָּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.21.19|1Kgs 21:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְצַח‎</span> [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]]; [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְצָ֑ח (צ־ַחׅ‎</span> [[Exod.20.13|Exod 20:13]] = [[Deut.5.17|Deut 5:17]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצֹהַּ‎</span> [[Hos.4.2|Hos 4:2]]; [[Jer.7.9|Jer 7:9]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹצֵחַ‎</span> [[Deut.19.3|Deut 19:3]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]] +; — ***murder, slay***, with premeditation, [[Exod.20.13|Exod 20:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) = [[Deut.5.17|Deut 5:17]]; [[Hos.4.2|Hos 4:2]]; [[Jer.7.9|Jer 7:9]]; [[1Kgs.21.19|1Kgs 21:19]] (all absolute); with accusative of person [[Deut.22.26|Deut 22:26]], unawares [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]] ***slay*** as avenger [[Num.35.27|Num 35:27]]; [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵמִית‎</span> v[[Num.35.19|Num 35:19]] v[[Num.35.21|Num 35:21]]); especially participle as substantive = ***slayer, manslayer***, without intent, [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]]; [[Deut.19.3|Deut 19:3]]; [[Deut.19.4|Deut 19:4]]; [[Deut.19.6|Deut 19:6]] also in [[BDB#P|P]]: [[Num.35.6|Num 35:6]]; [[Num.35.11|Num 35:11]]; [[Num.35.12|Num 35:12]]; [[Num.35.25|Num 35:25]]; [[Num.35.26|Num 35:26]]; [[Num.35.27|Num 35:27]]; [[Num.35.28|Num 35:28]]; [[Josh.20.3|Josh 20:3]]; [[Josh.20.5|Josh 20:5]]; [[Josh.20.6|Josh 20:6]]; [[Josh.21.13|Josh 21:13]]; [[Josh.21.21|Josh 21:21]]; [[Josh.21.27|Josh 21:27]]; [[Josh.21.32|Josh 21:32]]; [[Josh.21.26|Josh 21:26]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], [[BDB#Baer|Baer]], v[[Josh.21.38|Josh 21:38]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]]; all [[BDB#P|P]]); ***murderer***, with intent, [[Num.35.16|Num 35:16]] (twice in verse); [[Num.35.17|Num 35:17]] (twice in verse); [[Num.35.18|Num 35:18]] (twice in verse); [[Num.35.19|Num 35:19]]; [[Num.35.21|Num 35:21]] (twice in verse); [[Num.35.30|Num 35:30]]; [[Num.30.31|Num 30:31]] also [[Job.24.14|Job 24:14]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵרָצֵחַ‎</span> [[Prov.22.13|Prov 22:13]] ***I shall be slain; Participle*** feminine singular as adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשָּׁה הַנִּרְצָחָה‎</span> [[Judg.20.4|Judg 20:4]] ***the murdered woman.*** **Pi\`el** (intensive) ***murder, assassinate:*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַצְּחוּ‎</span> [[Hos.6.9|Hos 6:9]] (absolute), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַצֵּ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Ps.94.6|Ps 94:6]] (accusative of person, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרַג‎</span>); [[Ps.62.4|Ps 62:4]] see below; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַצֵּחַ‎</span>, as substantive [[2Kgs.6.32|2Kgs 6:32]] ***murderer, assassin***; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרֵצְּחִים‎</span> [[Isa.1.21|Isa 1:21]]***assassins.*** **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect***, 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרָצְּחוּ‎</span> [[Ps.62.4|Ps 62:4]], so [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]], [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרָצְחוּ‎</span>, but Ben Naphtali **Pi\`el** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּרַצְּחוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>143</sup>), so [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others ***ye murder*** (or ***batter, shatter***).
